name: Care For Curls Set
description:
A triple threat! 

Give your hair full treatment with this fantastic set of essential My Curls products.

The Care for Curls set includes:

1 Cleansing Cream (a gentle cleansing shampoo)
1 Coco Curly Conditioner (a nourishing creamy conditioner)
1 Curl Smoothie (an invigorating lotion for hair of all textures)

Key Benefits:
Cleansing Cream gently cleanses without stripping your hair of moisture.

Coco Curly Conditioner conditions and nourishes.

Curl Smoothie moisturises and invigorates hair of all textures including curls, coils, kinks and waves.

* Each bottle is now 250ml! That's a whooping 100ml increase!

name: Coco Curly Conditioner
description:
Need a conditioner that makes detangling easy and moisturises your hair? Then the Coco Curly Conditioner is for you. A rich and creamy conditioner filled with ingredients that penetrate deeply into the hair shaft, restores damage, enhances shine and provides instant moisture. 

Key Ingredients:

Coconut oil: A natural solid oil that has been used for centuries to soften hair. It is one of a handful of oils proven to penetrate the hair shaft and provide moisturisation.

Jojoba oil: Restores natural glow and luster. Jojoba oil is the closest oil to the bodies natural sebum and conditions and strengthens hair by enhancing cell growth. 

Lavender Essential Oil: An aromatic and therapeutic aromatherapy oil historically used to soothe the scalp.

Key Benefits:

Conditions and moisturises
Makes detangling easy
Reduces frizz and restores luster

name: Curls In Condition Set
description:
A wonderful set of two essential My Curls products.

The Cleansing Cream is a brilliant nourishing shampoo that will cleanse your curls without stripping your hair of its natural oils. Afterwards, condition your hair with the delightful and nourishing Coco Curly Conditioner.

This set includes:

1 Cleansing Cream (a nourishing shampoo) 
1 Coco Curly Conditioner (a rich and creamy conditioner)

Key Benefits:

Save 10%!
Use the Cleansing Cream to remove dirt and excess oils.
Nourish your curls with a creamy and moisturising conditioner that's filled with natural conditioning ingredients.

*We've increased each product by 100ml. So each bottle is now 250ml!

name: Cleansing Cream
description:
Fed up with shampoos that dry your curls out? Then you're in need of our Cleansing Cream. This gentle cleansing shampoo contains a variety of natural ingredients that will lift dirt, remove excess oils without stripping your hair of its natural oils and sebum whilst also strengthening your hair. 

Key Ingredients:

Aloe Vera: has been used for centuries to combat hair loss, reduce frizz and enhance curl definition.

Sunflower Oil: Rich in vitamins and fatty acids, is brilliant for nourishing curly hair and adds luster and shine.

Panthenol: (Vitamin B5) Strengthens hair by penetrating the hair shaft and reparing surface damage, provides rejunivation and moisturisation.

Lemon essential oil: Known for its therapeutic properties, lemon essential oil is detoxifying and sootheing.

Tee Tree Essential Oil: Native to Australia, this powerful oil combats dandruff, and heals flaky and itchy scalps.

Key Benefits:

Gently cleanses and doesn't leave hair feeling dry and brittle
Strengthens and nourishes hair
Brilliant for hair of all textures whether tightly curled, coily, curly or wavy.

name: Curl Smoothie
description:
Because naturally curly and kinky hair can easily become dry and brittle, we've created a lovely natural hair lotion that quenches dry hair. Filled with gorgeous ingredients like coconut oil, honey and vitamin e; the Curl Smoothie should be every curly girl's staple hair lotion.

Size: 250ml
Fragrance: Fruitylicious
